column4: Ek Phnom Kun Khmer Arena – សង្វៀនប្រដាល់គុនខ្មែរ ឯកភ្នំ will once again show top-level Kun Khmer Action with some of Cambodia’s best fighters. In the main event
column5: rising star Vann Voeurn will take on Muay Thai star Petchtho Pot.Chalad!------Ek Phnom Arena also welcomes Laotian fighter Somsack Dadevong that will battle with Cambodian talent Kuon Bunhim in the co main event! In total there will be six Kun Khmer fights and tons of top class action.------1. Kun Khmer:------ Cambodia vs. Cambodia------54 kg: Mith Vireak vs. Ly Chhunheng------2. Kun Khmer:------ Cambodia vs. Cambodia------51 kg: Han Kimhour vs. Chhay Chhaya------3. Kun Khmer:------ Cambodia vs. Cambodia------54 kg: Sok Rithy vs. Pel Theara------4. Kun Khmer:------ Cambodia vs. Cambodia------57 kg: Mo Narak vs. Tha Nasith------5. INTERNATIONAL TOP FIGHT ------Cambodia vs. Laos------57 kg: Kuon Bunhim vs. Somsack Dadevong------6. SUPERFIGHT ------ Cambodia vs. Thailand------57 kg: Vann Voeurn vs. Petchtho Pot.Chalad
